resources.string: Potions and poisons you make are 25/50% stronger.
Eating an ingredient reveals all of its effects.
You gather one/two extra ingredients from plants.
Create twice as many potions and poisons from the same number of ingredients.
You have 50/100% extra Magicka Regeneration while wearing robes.
Armor spells are 50/100% stronger while wearing robes.
Spells and enchantments cost 10% less while wearing robes.
Your Magicka regenerates twice as fast when you fall below half Magicka while wearing robes.
Protection spells like Oakflesh and Fire Shell last three times as long when dual cast.
Protection spells like Oakflesh and Fire Shell affect nearby allies when dual cast.
You resist 50% of incoming stagger while under the effects of an armor spell.
You have 25% Magic Resistance while under the effect of an armor spell.
You have a 25% chance to absorb the Magicka from incoming spells while under the effect of an armor spell.
Bows have a 50% chance to stagger enemies.
You can move faster with a drawn bow.
Bows have a 10/20% chance of dealing critical damage.
Critical hits with bows deal three times/five times damage.
Zooming in with a bow slows down time.
Bows deal guaranteed critical damage to enemies at full Health.
Blocking no longer slows your movement.
Blocking with a shield reduces incoming arrow damage by 50%.
Blocking with a shield reduces incoming magic damage by 50%.
Blocking with a shield has a 50% chance to stagger your attacker.
Blocking with a shield slows down time during an enemy power attack.
Bashing does five/ten times more damage.
Bashes also deals damage to Magicka and Stamina.
Bashing causes enemies to take 25% extra damage for 10 seconds.
Bashing an enemy below half Health has a chance to knock them to the ground.
Summoned creatures gain 150/300 Armor Rating and 25/50% Magic Resistance.
Summoned creatures have 100 extra Health, Magicka, and Stamina.
Reanimated zombies last five times longer / until killed.
Reanimated zombies no longer disintegrate when they die.
Reanimated zombies regenerate Magicka and Stamina / Health, Magicka, and Stamina over time.
You can summon or reanimate one additional minion.
Bound weapons last five times longer.
Bound weapons have a chance to deal Fire, Frost, and Shock damage / extra Fire, Frost, and Shock damage.
Bound weapons deal extra damage/ even more damage.
Bound weapons reduce enemy Magic Resistance by 50% for 10 seconds.
Daedric shrines are twice as strong, / and you receive additional bonuses when you pray at their shrines.
Destruction spells cost 25% less when dual cast.
Destruction spells have a 50% chance to stagger enemies when dual cast.
You can maintain up to two/three runes at once.
Fire spells brand enemies for 10 seconds. Branded targets take 25/50% extra damage from fire spells.
Fire spells ignite enemies, dealing extra damage over 10 seconds.
Fire spells have a chance to incinerate targets when they fall below half Health.
When you have a frost spell equipped, you reduce the Frost Resistance of all nearby enemies by up to 50/100%.
Frost spells reduce enemy attack damage by 25% for 10 seconds.
Frost spells have a chance to freeze targets who fall below half Health.
Shock spells have a 25/50% chance to deal double damage.
Shock spells prevent their targets from regenerating Magicka for 10 seconds.
Shock spells have a chance to overload targets who fall below half Health.
Scrolls last three/five times as long.
Scrolls are twice/three times as strong.
Enchanted weapons regenerate some of their lost charge when they deal a killing blow.
Staves now regenerate some of their lost charge over time.
New enchantments on jewelry are 25% stronger.
New enchantments on armor are 25% stronger.
Health, Magicka, and Stamina enchantments are 25% stronger.
You can place two enchantments on a single item.
You receive a 25% bonus to armor rating when wearing three pieces of heavy armor.
Your Armor weighs nothing and doesn’t slow you down when wearing three pieces of heavy armor.
You receive a 25% bonus to armor rating when wearing three matching pieces of heavy armor.
You take 25% less damage when you fall below half Health while wearing three pieces of heavy armor.
You gain 50/100% Health Regeneration when wearing three pieces of heavy armor.
You resist 50% of incoming stagger when wearing three pieces of heavy armor.
You take 25/50% less damage while power attacking, drawing a bow, or casting a spell while wearing three pieces of heavy armor.
Your Health regenerates twice as fast when you fall below half Health while wearing three pieces of heavy armor.
You deal 25/50% unarmed damage while wearing heavy gauntlets.
Unarmed power attacks deal 25/50% more damage while wearing heavy gauntlets.
Unarmed attacks deal Stamina damage / and prevent enemies from regenerating Stamina for 10 seconds.
You resist 25% of incoming damage while unarmed and wearing heavy gauntlets.
Unarmed power attacks deal 50% extra damage to targets who fall below half Health.
Unarmed power attacks have a chance to knock enemies down when they fall below half Health.
Your Illusion spells affect the undead / undead, Daedra, and Dwarven automatons.
Courage spells last three times longer.
Calm spells persist through one additional hit.
Silence spells dispel any magical effects on the target.
Paralysis spells last three times longer.
Frenzy spells increase the target’s weapon damage by 50% against everyone except the caster.
Fear spells reduce the target’s Armor Rating by 150 and their Magic Resistance by 25%.
Command spells increase the target’s Armor Rating by 150 and their Magic Resistance by 25%.
You receive a 25% armor bonus when wearing three pieces of light armor.
Your armor weighs nothing and doesn’t slow you down when wearing three pieces of light armor.
You receive a 25% armor bonus when wearing three matching pieces of light armor.
You spend 25% less Stamina when power attacking or drawing a bow when wearing three pieces of light armor.
You gain 50/100% Stamina Regeneration when wearing three pieces of light armor.
You move 10/20% faster when wearing three pieces of light armor.
You move 20% faster when sprinting while wearing three pieces of light armor.
Your Stamina regenerates twice as fast when you fall below half Stamina while wearing three pieces of light armor.
You are 25/50% better at picking locks.
You find more gold on your adventures.
You can pick locks without being seen.
You find valuable gems in unexpected places.
Your carrying capacity is increased by 50/100.
You find more rare loot in dungeons.
Your lockpicks start close to their opening position.
You find valuable treasure wherever you go.
Power attacks with one-handed weapons deal 25/50% extra damage and have a chance to decapitate your enemies.
Power attacks with one-handed weapons deal 50% extra damage to targets who are power attacking, drawing a bow, or casting a spell.
Power Attacks with One-handed weapons deal 50% extra damage against target who fall below half Health.
Repeated power attacks against a single target with One-handed weapons deal up to double damage.
You attack 20% faster with One-handed weapons.
Swords and daggers have a 10/20% chance of dealing critical damage.
Critical attacks with swords and daggers deal three/five times as much damage.
War axes deal extra damage over 5/10 seconds.
War axes deal three/five times as much damage over time.
Maces reduce enemy armor rating by 150/300 for 10 seconds.
Maces deal 25/50% extra damage to staggered targets.
Dual wield power attacks cost 25% less Stamina.
Dual wield power attacks deal 25/50% more damage.
You resist 25% of all incoming damage while dual wielding.
You are 25/50% more likely to succeed at pickpocketing.
You are more likely to succeed when pickpocketing gold or keys.
You are more likely to succeed when pickpocketing gems or jewelry.
You are more likely to succeed against targets who are not detecting you.
You can harm enemies by placing poisons in their pockets.
Poisons that you place in enemy pockets are 50/100% stronger.
Instant healing spells such as Fast Healing and Close Wounds also restore Stamina.
Regeneration, Attunement, and Circle spells last twice as long.
Healing spells are 50% stronger when the target falls below half Health.
Once per day, you fully heal yourself when your health drops below 25%.
Regeneration and Attunement spells last three times as long when dual cast.
Divine shrines are twice as strong, / and you receive additional bonuses when you pray at their shrines.
Ward spells resist 50% of incoming weapon damage.
Ward spells absorb Magicka from incoming spells.
Sun spells deal extra damage / even more damage over time.
Turn Undead spells deal damage over time.
When you have a Poison spell equipped, you reduce the Poison Resistance of all nearby enemies by up to 50/100%.
Poison spells deal 50/100% extra damage to targets who fall below half Health.
You can temper all items by one/two additional tiers.
You can temper all items by one additional tier.
You can temper all items by one additional tier.
You can temper all items by one additional tier.
You can create Steel and Leather items at any forge.
You can create Dwarven, Scaled, and Steel Plate items at any forge.
You can create Elven items at any forge.
You can create Glass items at any forge.
You can create Nordic and Orcish items at any forge.
You can create Ebony items at any forge.
You can create Daedric and Dragon items at any forge.
You are 25/50% harder to detect while sneaking.
Your spells are silent to others.
Damage-dealing spells are 50/100% stronger while sneaking and undetected.
Sneak attacks with bows deal 50/100% extra damage.
Sneak attacks with melee weapons deal 50% more damage.
Sneak attacks with one-handed weapons 50% extra damage.
Sneak attacks with daggers deal 50/100% extra damage.
You no longer trigger traps, and you can execute a silent roll while sneaking.
Once every 10 seconds, you can sneak in combat to turn invisible for 5 seconds.
Once every 10 seconds, sneaking in combat causes enemies to stop searching for you.
Merchants have extra gold / even more extra gold for bartering.
You can invest in a shopkeeper’s business to increase their available gold.
You can sell any item to any merchant in Tamriel.
You are much more likely to succeed at persuasion and intimidation, and you can bribe guards to ignore crimes.
You can sell stolen items to any merchant.
Your Shouts last twice as long.
Your Shout cooldown is decreased by 25/50%.
Your Shouts have a 50% chance to have no cooldown.
Power attacks with Two-handed weapons deal 25/50% extra damage and have a chance to decapitate your enemies.
Power attacks with Two-handed weapons deal 50% extra damage to targets who are power attacking, drawing a bow, or casting a spell.
Power attacks with Two-handed weapons 50% extra damage to targets who fall below half Health.
Repeated power attacks against a single target with Two-handed weapons deal up to double damage.
Power attacks with two-handed weapons hit all targets in front of you.
Greatswords have a 10/20% chance of doing critical damage.
Critical attacks with greatswords deal three/ five times more damage.
Battleaxes deal damage over time/ more damage over a longer time.
Battleaxes deal three/ five times as much damage over time.
Warhammers reduce enemy armor rating by 150/300 for 10 seconds.
Warhammers deal 25/50% extra damage to staggered targets.
